name: Farm your way to death
description:
Can you survive the ghost apocalypse, and maintain your hunger? Well, this game has exactly that. You play as a farmer who was taking care of his crops and boom, ghost apocalypse. You have to kill ghosts to get food before they kill you. Let's see if you can survive.

How to play:

W, A, S, D to move

Click on ghosts to kill them

Click, hold and drag carrots to the farmland

Try and survive ;)
